title: The title of the ticket.
src_url: The url of a ticket in the ticket system.
status: The normalized identifier for the ticket status. Should be one of: New, In Progress, Notified, On Hold, Resolved, Closed, Canceled, Reopened
type: The linked ticket type determines whether the ticket is internal or in an external ticketing system. One of: Unknown, Internal, External, Other
source: The name of the source of the ticket
